fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Drop a hydrogen bomb onto someone’s house dealing an unstoppable attack

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You must wait a night after using a bomb to rebuilt another
-If you’re roleblocked during your cooldown, you must wait another night to build your bomb
-With the necronomicon, your attack becomes astral and rampages, and you become RB immune
